work.name: Department of Computer Architecture and Automation, Complutense University of Madrid
work.summary: Development of predictive models applied to neurodegenerative diseases.

work.name: Investing PROFit Wisely
work.summary: Implementation of financial AI models and development of fundamental analysis strategies.

work.name: Department of Artificial Intelligence and Big Data applied to Neurology, Ace Alzheimer Center Barcelona
work.summary: Development of pipelines and application of AI models based on neuroimaging, speech and neuropsychological data.

courses: Thesis: Exploring the development and applications of DESI-MS (desorption electrospray ionization mass spectrometry) and REIMS (rapid evaporative ionization mass spectrometry) technologies.
Thesis: Tool for automatic diagnosis of neurodegenerative diseases by Machine Learning techniques.
Thesis: New approaches based on Artificial Intelligence for the study of neurodegenerative diseases and brain connectivity.
